channel.title: What would you do if u saw a Combine?
channel.description: What would u do? I would run away :slight_smile:

item.title: What would you do if u saw a Combine?
item.dc:creator: AntiBeast
item.description:
I’d be prepared to get mercilessly owned for the next seven hours.

Read full topic
item.source: What would you do if u saw a Combine?

item.title: What would you do if u saw a Combine?
item.dc:creator: TectonInd
item.description:
Assuming it’s a lone Soldier, and I’m armed with a pistol and knife,

[align=center]Get behind cover,
See what weapon it has,[/align]

[align=left]AR2[/align] [align=center]SMG1[/align] [align=right]SHOTTY[/align]
[align=left]Run. Run so far away.[/align] [align=center]Attempt to knife.[/align] [align=right]Retreat, try to snipe with pistol.[/align]

Read full topic
item.source: What would you do if u saw a Combine?

item.title: What would you do if u saw a Combine?
item.dc:creator: JohnFreeman
item.description:
Or even better, take a crowbar, use it to bring his face close to mine, and then point blank shoot with a magnum.
[/QUOTE]
Why not just bust his face up with the crowbar? It’s awesome to see.

Read full topic

item.title: What would you do if u saw a Combine?
item.dc:creator: JohnFreeman
item.description:
I would either pick up the nearest soda can and throw it at his head,
Join CP so I could get a stunstick,
or Just sit there and scream, “WHY DO YOU HATE HUMENS!?” and make this face: D=<

item.title: What would you do if u saw a Combine?
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
what I would do? Well 1st: search somewhere to join CP, 2nd try to turn into a soldier, 3 try to go to elite, 4 betray the administrator and kill him, 5 be the administrator by lying saying: I was protecting him from Gordan Freeman but he knock’d me off and shot’d him, he’s last words were: you will be the next administrator, 6 Rule tha world? nah I preffear rule only a city after looking what happened to city 17 with the rebelz.

Also if all this crap fails there’s an alternative way: 1 join CP, 2 turn into soldier, 3 Die in war against Freeman; It would be an honor fight for the combine…

Read full topic
item.source: What would you do if u saw a Combine?

item.title: What would you do if u saw a Combine?
item.dc:creator: SwimSquirrel
item.description:
It depends. If he/it was carrying a weapon I’d stay on the safe side and run like hell. If he wasn’t, I would run up and punch him. If he yelled “You son of a bitch!” in a muffled human voice, then all would be well and I’d go play hl2. :retard:

Read full topic
item.source: What would you do if u saw a Combine?

only if you can get to it before it uses telekenesis on you. once it does ur fucked

item.title: What would you do if u saw a Combine?
item.dc:creator: Bobski507
item.description:
Grovel and then ask where the nearest recruiting center is. If it was a synth, cower, run, and if found throw a rock at it to go down fighting.As a plus, the reaction of anybody who witnessed a lone human throwing a rock at a Hunter/Strider/Gunship would be priceless.
